channel.title: Count up on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in Count up on Praveen Lobo

item.title: Javascript Counter
item.description: John Watt sent me a request asking if I could help with changing the JavaScript CountUp Timer to show only the number of days in a counter. He also wanted to display the days in 3 digits. I did reply with changes but it had a defect due to a last minute change! So, I wrote a clean script which is the reason for this post. One main improvement here is, the script doesn’t update every second.

item.title: JavaScript CountUp Timer
item.description: Update (2018): I have moved the code to GitHub - JavaScript Counters AS IS. I was in need of timer to mark an important decision; I did what most of us would do - search on the internet. I found quite a few of them, but I didn’t like any of them. Some of them were unnecessarily complicated; a couple of others weren’t easily understandable; most of them were using approximation (esp.
